#include <stdio.h>
/* count digits, white space, others */
main() {
int c, i, nwhite, nother;
int ndigit[10];
nwhite = nother = 0;
for (i = 0; i < 10; ++i)
ndigit[i] = 0;
while ((c = getchar()) != EOF)
if (c >= '0' && c <= '9')
++ndigit[c-'0'];
else if (c==' '||c=='\n'||c=='\t')
++nwhite;
else
++nother;
printf(""digits ="");
for (i = 0; i < 10; i++)
printf("" %d"", ndigit[i]);
printf("", white space = %d, other = %d\n"", nwhite, nother);
}
